effect.diamond_pearl: Changes the target’s ability to insomnia. If the target’s ability is truant or multitype, this move will fail.
effect.platinum: Changes the target’s ability to insomnia. If the target’s ability is truant or multitype, this move will fail.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Changes the target’s ability to insomnia. If the target’s ability is truant or multitype, this move will fail.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Changes the target’s ability to Insomnia.
short_effect.platinum: Changes the target’s ability to Insomnia.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Changes the target’s ability to Insomnia.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A seed that causes worry is planted on the foe. It prevents sleep by making its ability Insomnia.
flavor_text.platinum: A seed that causes worry is planted on the foe. It prevents sleep by making its ability Insomnia.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A seed that causes worry is planted on the foe. It prevents sleep by making its ability Insomnia.
